examples.input: What are the top 10 consumed local parts under En-Route from January to December 2024?
examples.query: SELECT TOP 10 RP.[PART_CODE], RP.[PART_DESC], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(RP.[PART_QUANTITY] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [TOTAL_COUNT], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(RP.[PARTAMOUNT] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [TOTAL_VALUE] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] ROHDR INNER JOIN [MH_RO_PARTS] RP ON ROHDR.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] = RP.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] WHERE ROHDR.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' AND ((ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'En-Route' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) AND RP.[PART_CATEGORY_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Spares' AND RP.[PART_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%filter%' AND RP.[OEM_PART_IND] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'N' GROUP BY RP.[PART_CODE], RP.[PART_DESC] ORDER BY [TOTAL_COUNT] DESC

examples.input: Top 10 consumed Local parts under Paid Service from January to December 2024
examples.query: SELECT TOP 10 RP.[PART_CODE], RP.[PART_DESC], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(RP.[PART_QUANTITY] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [TOTAL_COUNT], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(RP.[PARTAMOUNT] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [TOTAL_VALUE] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS ROHDR INNER JOIN [MH_RO_PARTS] AS RP ON ROHDR.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] = RP.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] WHERE ROHDR.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' AND ((ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Paid Service' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Mechanical') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Charging' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Others') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('En-Route', 'Pre-Sale/PDI') AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) AND RP.[PART_CATEGORY_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Spares' AND RP.[PART_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%filter%' AND RP.[OEM_PART_IND] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'N' GROUP BY RP.[PART_CODE], RP.[PART_DESC] ORDER BY [TOTAL_COUNT] DESC

examples.input: What are the top 10 consumed Dealer Labour hours under Repair category across dealers from January to March 2024?
examples.query: SELECT TOP 10 AD.[DELR_NAME] AS [DEALER_NAME], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(RL.[STANDRD_HRS] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [TOTAL_COUNT], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(RL.[LABRAMOUNT] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [TOTAL_VALUE] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS ROHDR INNER JOIN [MH_RO_LABOUR] AS RL ON ROHDR.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] = RL.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] INNER JOIN [MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION] AS AD ON ROHDR.[PARNT_GROP] = AD.[PARNT_GROP] AND ROHDR.[LOCTN_CD] = AD.[LOCTN_CD] AND ROHDR.[PRODCT_DIVSN] = AD.[PRODCT_DIVSN] WHERE ((ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('Free Service', 'Paid Service', 'Repair') AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Mechanical') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Charging' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Others') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('En-Route', 'Pre-Sale/PDI') AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) AND RL.[LABOUR_TYPE_NAME] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Dealer Defined' AND ROHDR.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' GROUP BY AD.[DELR_NAME] ORDER BY [TOTAL_COUNT] DESC

examples.input: Top 10 Dealers with highest OEM Labour consumption under Repair from January to December 2024
examples.query: SELECT TOP 10 AD.[DELR_NAME] AS [DEALER_NAME], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(RL.[STANDRD_HRS] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [TOTAL_HOURS], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(RL.[LABRAMOUNT] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [TOTAL_VALUE] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS ROHDR INNER JOIN [MH_RO_LABOUR] AS RL ON ROHDR.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] = RL.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] INNER JOIN [MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION] AS AD ON ROHDR.[PARNT_GROP] = AD.[PARNT_GROP] AND ROHDR.[LOCTN_CD] = AD.[LOCTN_CD] AND ROHDR.[PRODCT_DIVSN] = AD.[PRODCT_DIVSN] WHERE ((ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('Free Service', 'Paid Service', 'Repair') AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Mechanical') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Charging' AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Others') OR (ROHDR.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('En-Route', 'Pre-Sale/PDI') AND ROHDR.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) AND RL.[LABOUR_TYPE_NAME] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'OEM Defined' AND RL.[LABOUR_GROUP_NAME] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%Local%' AND ROHDR.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' GROUP BY AD.[DELR_NAME] ORDER BY [TOTAL_HOURS] DESC

examples.input: Generate a Word Cloud for the model group code 'XUVN' from January to March 2024, excluding common maintenance terms
examples.query: SELECT MM.[MODL_GROP_CD] AS [MODEL_GROUP_CODE], CV.[VERBATIM_GROUP], CV.[VERBATIM_CODE], CV.[CUST_VERBTM_DESC], CV.[VERBATIM_GROUP_DESC], CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM], COUNT(CV.[VERBATIM_CODE]) AS [FREQUENCY_COUNT] FROM [MH_CUST_VERBATIM] AS [CV] INNER JOIN [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS [RHD] ON [CV].[SV_RO_HDR_SK] = [RHD].[SV_RO_HDR_SK] INNER JOIN [MH_MODEL_MASTER] AS [MM] ON [RHD].[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = [MM].[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE [MM].[MODL_GROP_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'XUVN' AND [RHD].[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' AND [CV].[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' GROUP BY MM.[MODL_GROP_CD], CV.[VERBATIM_GROUP], CV.[VERBATIM_CODE], CV.[CUST_VERBTM_DESC], CV.[VERBATIM_GROUP_DESC], CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] ORDER BY [FREQUENCY_COUNT] DESC

examples.input: Word Cloud for XUV300 Diesel MT BS6 customer verbatims from Jan-Dec 2024
examples.query: SELECT MM.[FAMLY_DESC] AS [FAMILY_DESCRIPTION], CV.[VERBATIM_GROUP], CV.[VERBATIM_CODE], CV.[CUST_VERBTM_DESC], CV.[VERBATIM_GROUP_DESC], CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM], COUNT(CV.[VERBATIM_CODE]) AS [FREQUENCY_COUNT] FROM MH_CUST_VERBATIM AS CV INNER JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS AS RHD ON RHD.[SV_RO_HDR_SK] = CV.[SV_RO_HDR_SK] INNER JOIN MH_MODEL_MASTER AS MM ON RHD.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = MM.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE MM.[FAMLY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'XUV300 Diesel MT BS6' AND RHD.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' AND ((RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('free service', 'paid service', 'en-route repair', 'repair') AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'mechanical') OR (RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('accessories', 'bodyshop')) OR (RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'sales & service' AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'accessories') OR (RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'pre-sale/pdi')) AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' AND CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' GROUP BY MM.[FAMLY_DESC], CV.[VERBATIM_GROUP], CV.[VERBATIM_CODE], CV.[CUST_VERBTM_DESC], CV.[VERBATIM_GROUP_DESC], CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM] ORDER BY [FREQUENCY_COUNT] DESC

examples.input: What are the Top 5 most frequently reported Voice of Customer (VoC) issues that repeat for the period January to March 2024?
examples.query: SELECT TOP 5 CV.[VERBATIM_CODE], COUNT(*) AS [REPEAT_COUNT], STRING_AGG(CV.[DEMANDED_VERBATIM], '; ') AS [COMBINED_VERBATIM] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS ROHDR INNER JOIN [MH_CUST_VERBATIM] AS CV ON ROHDR.[SV_RO_HDR_SK] = CV.[SV_RO_HDR_SK] WHERE ROHDR.[RO_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' AND ROHDR.[REPEAT_REPAIR_FLAG] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Y' GROUP BY CV.[VERBATIM_CODE] ORDER BY [REPEAT_COUNT] DESC

examples.input: Top 5 most frequently reported repeating parts by model group from January to March 2024
examples.query: SELECT TOP 5 RP.[PART_CODE], RP.[PART_DESC], COUNT(RP.[PART_CODE]) AS [TOTAL_COUNT], SUM(TRY_CAST(RP.[PART_QUANTITY] AS FLOAT)) AS [TOTAL_QUANTITY], SUM(TRY_CAST(RP.[PARTAMOUNT] AS FLOAT)) AS [TOTAL_VALUE] FROM MH_RO_PARTS RP INNER JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS RHD ON RHD.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] = RP.[SV_RO_BILL_HDR_SK] INNER JOIN MH_MODEL_MASTER MM ON RHD.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = MM.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE RHD.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' AND RHD.[REPEAT_REPAIR_FLAG] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Y' AND ((RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('Free Service', 'Paid Service', 'Repair') AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Mechanical') OR (RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories' AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories') OR (RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop' AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop') OR (RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Charging' AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Others') OR (RHD.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('En-Route', 'Pre-Sale/PDI') AND RHD.[SERVICE_GROUP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) GROUP BY RP.[PART_CODE], RP.[PART_DESC] ORDER BY [TOTAL_COUNT] DESC
